firmware_update_needed.name: Firmware Needs to be Updated
solutions: Go to a place with reliable WiFi signal and update the drone's firmware.

generic_esc_state_error.name: Generic (Non-indexed) ESC State Error Message
solutions: Read the other error messages to determine which ESC is not working properly.

sensor_fwd_vision_calibration.name: Front Vision Sensors Needs Calibration
solutions: Calibrate the front vision sensors using the calibration pattern sheet
